article.title: El Paso, Texas and New Mexico U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.short_title: El Paso, Texas and New Mexico USEAC Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the El Paso, Texas and New Mexico U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​​​

El Paso Office

El Paso U.S. Export Assistance Center

9570 Panamerican
El Paso, Texas 79928
Phone: 915-929-6971
Fax: 915-858-8857
Email:robert.queen@trade.gov

El Paso Staff

Robert Queen, International Trade Specialist

Phone: 915-929-6971
Fax: 915-858-8857
Email:robert.queen@trade.gov​

Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30am - 6:00 pm Eastern time.​
